### Compliance

Please review [`docs/cspice-policy.md`](../docs/cspice-policy.md). The checklist below is a summary only.

- [ ] This PR does not add raw/unmodified CSPICE toolkit archives or sources as published artifacts.
- [ ] This PR does not add kernels, datasets, or example data **or**, if it does, the PR description explicitly documents why the data is believed to be unrestricted/publicly distributable (including sources).
